reviews.review_msg: Very nice prof! Lucky to take her course at the first semester . She always helps students. Some tips are very helpful. Marking was fair and usually with useful comments.

Best professor i've had at SFU. Kerstin made attending class actually fun, knowledgeable, and enjoyable. She is incredibly helpful and nice! Easily approachable with an uplifting personality. Explains material thoroughly & clearly.
Helpful and reasonable prof. She's always approachable if you need additional help, plus she gives good feedback on assignments. Take Kerstin's class!
she is a great prof and very helpful!

She is the best teacher that I have ever met! She is very helpful. she always hands back our assignment for us to correct and gives us the final mark! she goes over through the whole textbook! good teaching strategy !

Kerstein is a very helpful teacher. She is one of the best english professors ever. She will guide you through anything you need help with. Just ask her anything you are unsure of and she will help you. Definitely a GPA booster if you attend class and do all the assignments.

She's extremely helpful and is passionate about teaching. Attending class is mandatory because if you miss one class you miss a lot of work. I learned a lot about my writing in this course. She gives a lot of feedback and guides you through assignments. She's a very nice lady!
